title: Interrupted Vol. 1
description:
There are only three things Cam Ellison wants in life: a loving husband, a baby and to find her first love, Ayden Park. But all that is taken away from her in a blink of an eye. Picking up the pieces to her life, Cam buries herself in work and her new boss, a young, millionaire CEO, A. Sharp.But he’s the man with two rules: 1. No repeats 2. No relationshipsCam pushes herself into Sharp's life, breaking down the walls he’s built. Soon they find themselves in a situation neither wants to walk away from. But when the door opens, everything changes. 
Interrupted is a three book erotic romance novella serial.
author: S. Moose
